      • updateAchievementProgress

        public int updateAchievementProgress(SocomRequest req)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                     org.json.JSONException,
                                     SocomException
        Update the achievement progress. Expects user id in session. Counter will be summed up if non-zero (can be negative). No action if counter is zero. Answers with json: instance = 'components.achievements.achievementprogressmessage.toJSONString'
        Parameters:
        req - Request with URL-Params: - achievementname (string) - gamename (string) - gamepassword (string) - counter (long)
        Returns:
        error code
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
